tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Having all four impacted wisdom teeths, Now started recovering from the surgery done by Dr Udhay and Oral Max surgeon Dr. Vijay its been 10 days of extracting all 4 as in 2 teeths at once in Gap of 7 days. It was almost manageable since my age is just 22 my body started recovering with a day or two. It took 8 days to heal on one side completely.

I had constant support from him through call even at night remainding me to take my medications to keeping ice packs. 

We planned it at 9Pm at night and it took 20 mins for both upper and lower wisdom teeths. Honestly to tell it was painless for both the sides and his method of using professional technique of teeth removal did not even give me a noticeable swelling anyway which is gone in 4 days.

Other side it was horizontal impact in left lower wisdom teeth and upper tooth took more than the right side to 35mins. Its been just 2 days I am recovering from it and Im happy all four came out without causing troubles.
That my story short. Thank you very much Doctor Udhay
reply_text: Tq so much for your valuable feedback sir, pls hv a regular dental visit to avoid dental problems

review: Really happy to visit Dr.Udhaya...he is very polite and genuinely I am saying that his work was really very satisfying and clear...While visiting him I have no idea about my issue in my tooth after a complete check up he has given a detailed explanation about my tooth issue.  I was really satisfied with his way of explanation & treatment plan,.. he has done a deep scaling and root planing & polishing, followed with medication. Now am feeling better after the treatment. Even during Corona period he has done everything in a proper manner by following proper sanitising ,temperature checking, pulse oxymeter ,no apparets, even I can check my weight also. He is having & following all these medical essential things, I will definitely refer Dr.Udhaya to my friends and colleagues to get a best treatment.
reply_text: Tq so much for your valuable feedback mam, pls hv a regular dental visit every year to avoid such problems
